scripts.build:headerApp:externals: ng build --extra-webpack-config projects/headerApp/webpack.externals.js --prod --project headerApp --single-bundle --output-hashing none && node build-elements.js headerApp
scripts.build:zomatoRestoListApp:externals: ng build --extra-webpack-config projects/zomatoRestoListApp/webpack.externals.js --prod --project zomatoRestoListApp --single-bundle --output-hashing none && node build-elements.js zomatoRestoListApp
scripts.build:zomatoRestoDetailsApp:externals: ng build --extra-webpack-config projects/zomatoRestoDetailsApp/webpack.externals.js --prod --project zomatoRestoDetailsApp --single-bundle --output-hashing none && node build-elements.js zomatoRestoDetailsApp
